snippet: In the latest border clash, a Pakistani Army officer died in Indian shelling near Skardu on the Line of Control, the disputed border between Pakistan and India.
abstract: Pakistan army officer dies in Indian shelling near Skardu on the Line of Control, disputed border between Pakistan and India, in latest border clash between two countries.
lead_paragraph: In the latest border clash, a Pakistani Army officer died in Indian shelling near Skardu on the Line of Control, the disputed border between Pakistan and India.

headline.main: Pakistan: Soldier Killed Near Disputed Indian Border
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Soldier Killed Near Disputed Indian Border
